description: Trying to make sense of software and hardware by developing rich applications,
mentoring some great minds and learning from awesome industry leaders leading to an enriching experience in Mobile application (iOS and Android), Java, Javascript,
Webservices (SOAP & ReST), Microservice Architecture, Docker, Azure PaaS, NoSql, Middleware SOA technologies
and self motivated with Python, Android development and machine learning. Aiming for crash proof highly scalable,
fault tolerance applications with core focus on DevSecOps

projects.title: Microsoft - Office
description: 1. Successfully delivered multiple Platform APIs for Oulook Mobile add-ins for 1P and 3P partners
2. Led and delivered 1P platform solutions for Word, Excel and Pwerpoint for new features developed separately and integrated with WXP apps

projects.title: PayPal - Payments
description: 1. Achieved an enriching Customer Experience for Activity module in Paypal's iOS and Android app by doing tech optimizations
2. Successfully delivered the front end developement from scratch for Document Center (self serve tax docs download). Its live in US.

projects.title: Walmart Labs - Pharmacy
description: 1. Led the execution and delivery of the Digital/Online Pharmacy (android, iOS and Web app) features for digital adoption and usage in US market
2.Successfully delivered 3 new features during the COVID-19 and a brand new feature for Immmunization for customers with E2E FE and BE development with deployment on Azure

projects.title: Amadeus - Travel
description: 1.Designed, developed and rearchitected the Lufthansa middleware integrations with Amadeus platform by bringing in 40% time to market efficiency in deployments of webservices by adapting automations
2.Lead the DevOps practice and was accountable for a suite of Amadeus Deployment tools with full ownership in Bangalore.
3. Accomplished 30% in tech debt reduction within 6 months of joining the team leading to better products.
4. Managed a global team of 13 in Bangalore and 6 in Erding (Germany) with 3 major products in scope.

projects.title: GE Healthcare - PET/MRI
description: 1. Architected, designed and developed the PET Graphical Prescription application for PET -MRI scanners.

2. Accomplished a new communication model development called GEOCOMM (GE Object Communication) by developing a framework based on Java's serialization and deserialization to communicate the data between Java and C++ components within the system

projects.title: Infosys - Retail
description: 1. Designed, developed, and supported in production the Point Of Sale suite of applications for Nordstrom.
2. Accomplished CIO award from Nordstrom for handling their legacy Mainframe application by successfully resolving a major bug leading to wrong numbers on the revenue during Sale period.
